amendment.description: Amendment provides for the consideration of H.R. 3194, District of Columbia Appropriations Act for FY 2000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that an amendment to H.R. 3194 that strikes section 175 shall be considered as adopted.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Linder.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Linder amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
